subsection.name: Building
subsection.p: QWT has a Maven multi-module build, just use the normal mvn clean install. However, install fails when executed without running ./install.sh once because I don't know how do model build-only-dependencies to the Plugin Module. See http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MNG-1883 and http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MNG-2668.

subsection.name: Eclipse
subsection.p: 1) Create a project for every module.
2) Create an M2_REPO variable pointing to your ~/.m2/repository directory

subsection.name: Modules
subsection.p: QWT has a Maven multi-module build with the following modules:

ul.li: Runtime: Java Class Libraries translated to JavaScript.
Qooxdoo: Java representation for Qooxdoo JavaScript classes.
Server: the servlet to drive applications.
